name: KnowledgeArticleVersionStandardController

constructors.name: KnowledgeArticleVersionStandardController
constructors.description: Creates a new instance of the ApexPages.KnowledgeArticleVersionStandardController class using the specified knowledge article.

params.name: article
params.description: The knowledge article, such as FAQ_kav.

methods.name: getSourceId
methods.description: Returns the ID for the source object record when creating a new article from another object.

methods.name: setDataCategory
methods.signature: public Void setDataCategory(String categoryGroup, String category)
methods.description: Specifies a default data category for the specified data category group when creating a new article.

description: KnowledgeArticleVersionStandardController objects offer article-specific functionality in addition to what is provided by the StandardController.
